loggedOutSuccessfully: You have been logged out successfully.
privacyPolicyP1: Your privacy is important to us. It is our policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website.
privacyPolicyP2: We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used.
privacyPolicyP3: We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
privacyPolicyP4: We use cookies to improve your experience on our site. By using our site, you consent to our use of cookies.
privacyPolicyP5: Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies.
privacyPolicyP6: Your continued use of our website will be regarded as acceptance of our practices around privacy and personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, feel free to contact us.
privacyPolicyP7: This policy is effective as of 1 August 2024.
invalidLinkDescription: Please enter a valid M3U/M3U8 link starting with http.
channelAddedDescription: {count, plural, =1 {# channel has been added to your library.} other {# channels have been added to your library.}}
channelAddErrorDescription: The M3U/M3U8 file could not be processed.
fileReadErrorDescription: The selected file could not be read. Please try again.
noChannelsFoundDescription: Could not find any channels in the provided source.
checkingChannelsDescription: Checking {count, plural, =1 {1 channel} other {# channels}} for availability.
noOnlineChannelsDescription: None of the found channels seem to be online. Please check the source.
verificationCancelledDescription: The channel verification process was cancelled.
verificationCompleteDescription: {count, plural, =1 {Found 1 online channel.} other {Found # online channels.}}
foundOnlineChannelsTitle: {count, plural, =1 {Found 1 online channel} other {Found # online channels}}
noChannelsSelectedDescription: Please select at least one channel to add.
noDefaultVideos: No videos found in the library.
channelsDeletedDescription: {count, plural, =1 {1 channel has been deleted.} other {# channels have been deleted.}}
deleteErrorDescription: An error occurred while deleting the channels.
notLoggedInDescription: You must be logged in to add channels.
notLoggedInToSave: You must be logged in to save channels to your account.
channelsExistDescription: {count, plural, =1 {One of the selected channels is already in your library.} other {# of the selected channels are already in your library.}}
noNewChannelsDescription: All selected channels are already in your library.
emailUpdateSuccessDescription: Your email address has been successfully changed.
passwordUpdateSuccessDescription: Your password has been successfully changed.
wrongPasswordError: The password you entered is incorrect.
reauthenticationNeededError: This action requires re-authentication. Please log out and log back in.
passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
linkCopiedDescription: The channel link has been copied to your clipboard.
copyErrorDescription: Could not copy the link to your clipboard.
importSharedChannelDescription: Do you want to add the channel '{channelName}' to your list?
browsingAsGuest: You are browsing as a guest.
qualityChangedDescription: Video quality has been set to {quality}.
bufferSizeChangedDescription: The buffer size has been set to {size}.
clearCacheConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all local data like favorites and settings. Continue?
cacheClearedDescription: The application cache has been cleared successfully.
cacheClearErrorDescription: Could not clear the cache. Please try again.

termsOfServiceP2: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on SnackingTV's app for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title.
termsOfServiceP3: The materials on SnackingTV's app are provided on an 'as is' basis. SnackingTV makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties.
termsOfServiceP4: In no event shall SnackingTV or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on SnackingTV's app.
termsOfServiceP5: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Delaware and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that State or location.
tosConfirmDescription: Before you can search for or add channels, you must read and accept the Terms of Service.
